metadata.Title: CVE-2017-17521 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description: uiutil.c in FontForge through 20170731 does not validate strings before launching the program specified by the BROWSER environment variable, which might allow remote attackers to conduct argument-injection attacks via a crafted URL, a different vulnerability than CVE-2017-17534.

criterions.comment: fontforge: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
